item.title: Trump announces 25% tariffs on foreign-made cars
item.description: President Trump on Wednesday said he is imposing a 25% tariff on automobiles not manufactured in the U.S.

item.title: Social Security overpayment policy is in effect today. What to know.
item.description: Starting today, the Social Security Administration will again take 100% of a beneficiary's check to recoup overpayments. Here's what to know.
